instruction: Place the apple behind the box on the table. We also need to specify the rotation of the object after placement:  the object is placed upright on the table and corresponds with how humans usually place the object, bottom down and top up.
position_instruction: Place the apple behind the box on the table.
rotation_instruction: We also need to specify the rotation of the object after placement:  the object is placed upright on the table and corresponds with how humans usually place the object, bottom down and top up.
